name: LouSangOnline
description:
A yee sang tossing simulation game that allow you to connect with your friends and family during Chinese new year. 

Lou Sang (or Prosperity Toss) is a Chinese traditional coming from Guangdong, China before the dishes were brought to Southeast Asia by Chinese immigration.

Action

[Mouse hold Left click] grabbing
[Mouse release left click] tossing

Caution:- Due to insufficient funding for the server maintainance, the server will only be online until 28th Feb 2022. If you need, the server script is provided, you can host your own server.
